name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sharpen AI: AI meeting summary for Google meets

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with AI-powered transcriptions, summaries, and action items for Google Meet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏔️ OVERVIEW
Sharpen AI simplifies your meeting workflow by turning Google Meet conversations into actionable insights. With real-time transcriptions, clear summaries, and automated follow-ups, Sharpen AI ensures you stay focused during meetings and organized afterward.

🗝️ KEY FEATURES

🔍 Real-Time Transcriptions
Capture every word spoken in Google Meet with instant, accurate transcription.

📝 One Comprehensive Summary Template
After each meeting, receive a polished Google Doc summary, including key points, action items, and follow-up tasks, tailored to enhance productivity and collaboration.

📧 Effortless Follow-Ups
Sharpen AI crafts personalized follow-up emails based on your meeting discussions, helping you save time and maintain momentum.

🤝 Google Workspace Integration
Enjoy seamless compatibility with Google Drive and Docs, ensuring all notes and summaries are automatically stored and accessible where you work.

🛡️ Private & Secure
Your data is never shared or stored by us. All transcriptions and summaries are saved directly in your Google Drive for maximum privacy.

⚙️ HOW IT WORKS
1️⃣ Install the Chrome Extension and pin it to your toolbar.
2️⃣ Join a Google Meet – Sharpen AI activates automatically.
3️⃣ View real-time transcriptions during the meeting.
4️⃣ Access a detailed summary in your Google Drive once the meeting ends.

🪄 WHO BENEFITS THE MOST

Sales Teams: Easily track follow-ups and client needs.
Product Managers: Document meeting outcomes and next steps effortlessly.
Marketing Professionals: Quickly compile actionable insights from brainstorming sessions.
Consultants and Coaches: Deliver professional meeting summaries to clients.
🏆 BENEFITS

🕒 Save Time: Spend more time focusing on conversations, less on note-taking.
🎯 Stay Organized: Review polished summaries instead of sifting through raw transcripts.
📈 Collaborate Effectively: Share actionable insights and summaries with your team instantly.
🔒 PRIVACY & SECURITY
Your privacy is our priority. All files are stored securely in your Google Drive, and we do not retain or share any meeting data.
